name: sse-streaming
description: Implement and debug SSE (Server-Sent Events) streaming for the Perplexity AI API, including parsing, reconnection, and retry logic.

task.description: What to implement or fix (e.g., 'add reconnection logic', 'parse new event type')

endpoint.description: API endpoint for the SSE stream

prompt: Work on SSE streaming for pplx-sdk. Task: {{task}}. Parse SSE format (event: and data: lines, blank line separates events). Use cursor-based resumption for reconnection. Apply RetryConfig with exponential backoff for transient failures. Handle answer_chunk (partial tokens) and final_response (complete entry) event types.
